channel.title: Open ears stops when playing music from iTunes library – Politepix

item.title: Open ears stops when playing music from iTunes library
item.dc:creator: rw86347
item.description:
As soon as I start playing music from the iTunes library open ears stops working.

Am I missing a setting or something?

item.title: Reply To: Open ears stops when playing music from iTunes library
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

This a known issue where other audio objects change the audio session settings that OpenEars requires in order to work. You can search these forums for the keywords audio, coexistence, and session in order to read more about this and see possible workarounds.
